blocks.content: Value of the zero Hilbert space operator (null projector). Remark in [Beran] p. 111. (Contributed by NM, 7-Feb-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)

thm ho0val(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, chba), wceq(cfv(ch0o, c0), c0v))
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(ch0o, c0), c0v, co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, chba), c0), cmv, cfv(cfv(cpjh, chba), c0)), wcel(c0, chba))
  syl5eqr(cfv(ch0o, c0), co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, chba), c0), cmv, cfv(cfv(cpjh, chba), c0)), cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, chba)), c0), wcel(c0, chba))
  fveq1i(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, chba)), c0, ch0o)
  eqtr4i(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, chba)), ch0o, cfv(cpjh, c0h))
  fveq2i(cpjh, cfv(cort, chba), c0h)
  choc1()
  df-h0op()
  mpan(wcel(c0, chba), wceq(cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, chba)), c0), co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, chba), c0), cmv, cfv(cfv(cpjh, chba), c0))), wcel(chba, cch))
  pjo(chba, c0)
  syl(wcel(c0, chba), wceq(co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, chba), c0), cmv, cfv(cfv(cpjh, chba), c0)), c0v), wcel(cfv(cfv(cpjh, chba), c0), chba))
  pjhcli(c0, chba)
  helch()
  hvsubid(cfv(cfv(cpjh, chba), c0))
}

thm df0op2() {
  |- wceq(ch0o, cxp(chba, c0h))
} = {
  eqtr4i(ch0o, cxp(chba, c0h), cxp(chba, csn(c0v)))
  mpbi(wceq(ch0o, cxp(chba, csn(c0v))), wf(ch0o, chba, csn(c0v)))
  mpbir2an(wf(ch0o, chba, csn(c0v)), wfn(ch0o, chba), wral(hs0, chba, wceq(cfv(ch0o, cv(hs0)), c0v)))
  ax-mp(wfn(ch0o, chba), wf(ch0o, chba, chba))
  ho0f()
  ffn(ch0o, chba, chba)
  rgen(hs0, chba, wceq(cfv(ch0o, cv(hs0)), c0v))
  ho0val(cv(hs0))
  fconstfv(hs0, ch0o, chba, c0v)
  fconst2(ch0o, chba, c0v)
  elexi(c0v, chba)
  ax-hv0cl()
  xpeq2i(chba, c0h, csn(c0v))
  df-ch0()
  diff.hs0.c(ch0o)
  diff.hs0.c(chba)
  diff.hs0.c(c0v)
}

thm dfiop2() {
  |- wceq(chio, cres(cid, chba))
} = {
  eqtri(chio, cres(cid, chba), cfv(cpjh, chba))
  df-iop()
  mp2an(wceq(cfv(cpjh, chba), cres(cid, chba)), wfn(cfv(cpjh, chba), chba), wfn(cres(cid, chba), chba))
  pjfni(chba)
  helch()
  fnresi(chba)
  mpbiri(wa(wfn(cfv(cpjh, chba), chba), wfn(cres(cid, chba), chba)), wceq(cfv(cpjh, chba), cres(cid, chba)), wral(hs0, chba, wceq(cfv(cfv(cpjh, chba), cv(hs0)), cfv(cres(cid, chba), cv(hs0)))))
  rgen(hs0, chba, wceq(cfv(cfv(cpjh, chba), cv(hs0)), cfv(cres(cid, chba), cv(hs0))))
  eqtr4d(cfv(cfv(cpjh, chba), cv(hs0)), cfv(cres(cid, chba), cv(hs0)), cv(hs0), wcel(cv(hs0), chba))
  pjch1(cv(hs0))
  fvresi(cv(hs0), chba)
  eqfnfv(hs0, cfv(cpjh, chba), chba, cres(cid, chba))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cpjh, chba))
  diff.hs0.c(chba)
  diff.hs0.c(cres(cid, chba))
}
